languages.text: "Если я допустил{mf||а} ошибку — я готов{mf||а} покаяться и предать колонию огню".
"If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."
languages.original_text: "Если я допустил{mf||а} ошибку — я готов{mf||а} покаяться и предать колонию огню".

traits.locale_text: "If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."
"If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."
"If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."
"If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."
"If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."

languages.text: 「私が過ちを犯したなら、行いを悔い、コロニーを炎で浄化しよう」
languages.original_text: "If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."

traits.locale_text: 「私が過ちを犯したなら、行いを悔い、コロニーを炎で浄化しよう」

languages.text: “如果我做错了什么，我愿意忏悔，并让整个殖民地变成一片火海。”
languages.original_text: "If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."

traits.locale_text: “如果我做错了什么，我愿意忏悔，并让整个殖民地变成一片火海。”

languages.text: «Si he cometido un error, estoy dispuest{mf|o|a} a arrepentirme e incinerar la colonia entera».
languages.original_text: "If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."

traits.locale_text: «Si he cometido un error, estoy dispuest{mf|o|a} a arrepentirme e incinerar la colonia entera».

languages.text: « Si j'ai péché, je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à me repentir et à purifier la colonie par le feu. »
languages.original_text: "If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'ai péché, je suis {mf|prêt|prête} à me repentir et à purifier la colonie par le feu. »

languages.text: "Sollte ich geirrt haben, bin ich bereit, zu bereuen und die Kolonie dem Feuer zu übergeben."
languages.original_text: "If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte ich geirrt haben, bin ich bereit, zu bereuen und die Kolonie dem Feuer zu übergeben."

languages.text: "Eğer bir hataya düşmüşsem cezamı çekmeye, koloninin de yanıp kül olmasına razıyım."
languages.original_text: "If I have erred, I am willing to repent and cast the colony into the fire."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer bir hataya düşmüşsem cezamı çekmeye ve koloninin yanıp kül olmasına razıyım."
